reviews.review_msg: Dr. Olyaei is absolutely a stand-out professor! She cares a lot about her students and puts a lot of effort into conducting her lectures. Please make it a point to catch her during her office hours for clarifications/advice. Not only will she give you course-related advice, but she will help you map out your career priorities if you need it.

Shiva was a good instructor. It was her first semester at SFU and she had some kinks to get out, but she did well. She's super kind and caring and tries to cover ground in lectures that will help people with their papers. The final paper was worth 45% though, so I wouldn't recommend her classes to people who aren't good writers.
